Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Renders contracts entered into for the sale of goods via electronic commerce unenforceable in certain cases
Summary: Renders contracts entered into for the sale of goods via electronic commerce unenforceable if such business did not furnish accurate contact information on the business website on which such transaction was made.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to the enforceability of certain electronic commerce transactions
